name: Los Veranos Canopy Tour
description: Los veranos Canopy Tour is Mexico’s most popular canopy tour, and for good reason. It was built in the lush, tropical jungle on a beautiful river. The canopy consists of 14 zip lines, including a thrilling last run where double lines allow you to race each other! You will glide effortlessly at speeds up to 30 miles per hour, and you will be suspended at over 500 feet above the valley and river.
